Hi,
Here are two resources that can help you to determine how to track absenteeism in your local government.
“Latest Front in the Battle Against Wasteful Spending” discusses the importance of using up to date and transparent absenteeism tracking methods in local governments. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303639
“Benefits Showdown: Traditional Leave vs. Paid Time Off” compares the two most common leave models and how time can be tracked in each model.
icma.org/Documents/QuestionAnswer/Document/7517
Aloha,
James Davidson
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
jdavidson@icma.org
